extensionDescription.message: This is a timer for those who want to use the Pomodoro Technique. A notification screen will be displayed at the end of the set time.

initMessage.message: Press START to begin your work.

workText.message: Time until the end of work:

workNotificationText.message: Work session has ended. Press the OK button to start your break.

breakText.message: Time until the end of break:

breakNotificationText.message: Break has ended. Press the OK button to start your work session.
